title: How to Take Care of My Cows Daily Routine for Top Care

tasks.task: Operating farming equipment (specifically a combine harvester or similar)
subtasks: Inserting the key into the ignition
Turning the key to start the machine
Observing the battery level and ensuring sufficient power
Monitoring the disk shredder's operation
Adjusting the machine's speed as needed
Operating levers or controls to engage the hugger
Checking the mixing drum's operation
Ensuring the machine is functioning smoothly

tasks.task: Driving a combine harvester through a field
subtasks: Navigating the machine between rows of crops
Aligning the machine with the direction of harvest
Operating the lift to deposit cut material onto the platform
Manipulating the threshing mechanism to separate grain from chaff
Adjusting the air blast to remove light debris
Monitoring grain moisture and impurities
Initiating the mixing drum operation
Regulating the mixing process to ensure proper uniformity
Stopping the mixing drum when necessary
Applying the brakes to halt the combine
Disengaging safety features if required
Performing post-operation inspections
